name: John Lemon (SelZ)
description:
John Lemon is a fantastic  and original minigame from Unity Learn.

I did this project during the Videogame Programming course with Unity and I present it here to show the concepts learned through its realization.

  • Basic artificial intelligence of enemies and patrol system.
  • Post Processing.
  • Movement of the protagonist with 3D physics.
  • Basic interface of victory, defeat and step between scenes.

Assets from Unity Store
